Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of the Triforce# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

GC (Maze).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.
